Class Couch::Row
In: src/couchdb/row.rb
Parent: Hash

This class represents a row of data returned by a Table query

The Row is a Hash of column values selected from a CouchDb document. The values generally are a subset of those of the complete Couch::Doc. A Row will only have values from a single Couch::Doc

Methods

id   id=   to_s  

Public Instance methods

id()

The Couch::Doc ID represented by this Row
